per_frame_1=warp = 0;
per_frame_2=wave_r = bass_att*.3;
per_frame_3=wave_g = treb_att*.3;
per_frame_4=wave_b = mid_att*.3;
per_frame_5=ob_r = 0.5+0.5*sin(time*5.12);
per_frame_6=ob_b = 0.5+0.5*sin(time*6.112);
per_frame_7=ob_g = 0.5+0.5*sin(time*7.212);
per_frame_8=q1 = zoom + pow((bass+bass_att),3)*.009-.02;
per_pixel_1=zoom =q1+ rad*sin(ang*25)*.1;
per_pixel_2=du = x*2-1 - q1;
per_pixel_3=dv = y*2-1 - q2;
per_pixel_4=dist = sqrt(du*du+dv*dv);
per_pixel_5=ang2 = atan2(du,dv);
per_pixel_6=mult = 0.008/(dist+0.4);
per_pixel_7=dx = mult*sin(ang2-1);
per_pixel_8=dy = mult*cos(ang2-1);
per_pixel_9=du = x*2-1 - q3;
per_pixel_10=dv = y*2-1 - q4;
per_pixel_11=dist = sqrt(du*du+dv*dv);
per_pixel_12=ang2 = atan2(du,dv);
per_pixel_13=mult = 0.008/(dist+0.4);
per_pixel_14=dx = dx + mult*sin(ang2+1);
per_pixel_15=dy = dy + mult*cos(ang2+1);
per_pixel_16=du = x*2-1 - q5;
per_pixel_17=dv = y*2-1 - q6;
per_pixel_18=dist = sqrt(du*du+dv*dv);
per_pixel_19=ang2 = atan2(du,dv);
per_pixel_20=mult = 0.008/(dist+0.2);
per_pixel_21=dx = dx + mult*sin(ang2+2);
per_pixel_22=dy = dy + mult*cos(ang2+2);
per_pixel_23=du = x*2-1 - q7;
per_pixel_24=dv = y*2-1 - q8;
per_pixel_25=dist = sqrt(du*du+dv*dv);
per_pixel_26=ang2 = atan2(du,dv);
per_pixel_27=mult = 0.008/(dist+0.2);
per_pixel_28=dx = dx + mult*sin(ang2-2);
per_pixel_29=dy = dy + mult*cos(ang2-2);
per_pixel_30=zoom = 3*dx - 3*dy+1;
per_pixel_31=//rot = 3*dx - 3*dy;
per_pixel_32=//dx = 0;
per_pixel_33=//dy =0;
